home.intro-1:
Tertiary education is considered to be the stepping
 stone to all the careers that we want to pursue. Don't struggle alone! Let C.E.C guide you on this journey.
home.intro-2:
The limits of my language mean the limits of my world 
-Ludwig Wittgenstein. 
Learn English with C.E.C today and work beyond your limits with qualified teachers.

about-one.p1: At C. Education Consultancy, we are experts in teaching and testing English as a second and foreign language.
about-one.p2: We are dedicated to providing students with proactive learning solutions and techniques that will stay with them, not just through language exams but through their entire lives.
about-one.p3: Students who have taken part in our courses have had proven success in all the English Language components. We believe in nurturing each student, providing not just academic support but moral support throughout the process.
about-one.p4: Our lessons are personalized and our teaching services are affordable. As educators, we continuously aim to improve students' areas of difficulty and introduce students to conversational topics in real-time while, helping them advance to higher levels of understanding and speaking.

ankara.name: Ankara Medipol
ankara.description:
Where science and tradition come together with a modern understanding of
education.

canada.name: Canadian Imperial College
canada.description:
The prerequisite for motivation and success in any endeavor is a BIG vision
for your future. If you’re stuck in the past, you’re really in trouble.

cooking.name: Gastronomicom cooking school
cooking.description:
Our highly experienced chefs/teachers provide hands-on classes to a one
                  Michelin Star level. All of our cooking and pastry courses are conducted in English.

graduate.name: International Graduate Center
graduate.description:
one of Germany's first graduate schools offering MBA degrees, is aimed at
future managers.

solutions.name: International Student Solutions
solutions.description:
International Student Solutions has a commitment to the continued improvement
of student services and the overall experience for international students.

american.name: Girne American University
american.description:
Girne American University is dedicated to making American model learning
opportunities accessible throughout life and to making them challenging and relevant to a diverse
population of young adults.

mesoyios.name: Mesoyios College
mesoyios.description:
an institution operating from 1998 as an educational center specialized in
the hospitality industry.

poland.name: Education Poland
poland.description:
Education Poland is the only official university partner & admissions office
for several polish universities.

wittenborg.name: Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences
wittenborg.description: The most international business and management school in the Netherlands.

ge.name: GE Global
ge.description:
GE Global Consultants are committed to providing an ultimate solution of
services for International students in the categories of Foundation, Undergraduate, and postgraduate
sectors.

ted.name: TEDEd
ted.description: Our mission is to spark and celebrate the ideas of students and teachers throughout the world. Follow for program updates + new animated videos every week!

ng.name: National Geographic Learning
ng.description: National Geographic Learning’s mission is to bring the world to the classroom and the classroom to life.

oxford.name: Oxford University Press
oxford.description: Oxford University Press – one of the world’s oldest higher education institution divisions, founded in 1586, showed its new logo. The style update was carried out for the first time in the last 30 years.

ielts.name: IELTS Prep
ielts.description: Prepare with confidence for your upcoming IELTS Academic or General Training test. The IELTS Prep App gives you instant, unlimited access to all the right tools you need to prepare for your test – anytime, anywhere.

cambridge.name: Cambridge University Press
cambridge.description: Our mission is to unlock people’s potential with the best learning and research solutions. Our vision is a world of learning and research inspired by Cambridge. Cambridge University Press is a world leader in the field of English Language Teaching (ELT) publishing, with titles for teachers and learners of English, covering all levels from kindergarten to university and adult language training.

toefl.name: ETS TOEFL
toefl.description: Students can achieve their dreams of university study, immigration and more with the TOEFL iBT® and TOEFL® Essentials™ tests. Each test is uniquely designed so they can choose the TOEFL test that's best for them.

macmillan.name: MacMillan English
macmillan.description: Macmillan Education is a global publisher, specialising in English language teaching (ELT) and curriculum publishing. Their ELT publishing ranges from internationally recognised courses such as New Inside Out and In Company, through innovative titles like Aviation English, to their award-winning range of learners' dictionaries.

ef.name: English File
ef.description: Learn more English here with interactive exercises, useful downloads, games, and weblinks. Practise your grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, listening, and reading, and have some fun too.

toeic.name: ETS TOEIC
toeic.description: Whether you are an individual who wants to stand out against the competition or an organization seeking to build a more skilled team or prepare work-ready students, the TOEIC® program can help you achieve your goal.

opic.name: OPIC
opic.description: OPIc Tips – Oral proficiency interview by a computer is a popular English speaking evaluation taken by many business professionals. Many corporate professionals need to attain a high score to get promotions or work overseas

duolingo.name: Duolingo English Test Preparation
duolingo.description: In 2014, Duolingo launched a web English proficiency exam so as to return out as an alternate for other English proficiency exams like IELTS/TOEFL. This blog covers all the Duolingo accepted universities across the United Kingdom, USA, Canada, Australia, Japan, Europe, and New Zealand.

tefl.name: TEFL CERTIFIED
tefl.description: This 120 hour TEFL certification is TEFL Educator's most popular course. It covers important English teaching fundamentals and includes a dedicated section on teaching English to young learners (TEYL). Trainees can expect live tutoring via Skype and personalized email support. Numerous podcasts and videos demonstrating real classroom environments are also provided.

quote1.content: The IELTS speaking lesson as a whole was very useful. I got a speaking test exactly similar to the real one, I think this is a very great and important step. My instructor notes my mistakes while speaking then she alerted me in a very kind and respectful way. At the end of the lesson, my instructor gave me great and useful tips to follow during the exam as well as during my preparation for the test. In the end, I want to thank you all for your efforts.
quote1.name: Mel
quote1.headline: Student

quote2.content: With (CEC) I had excellent teachers! They provide both a great mix of listening, speaking and practical learning activities and a very safe, supportive learning environment. Their teaching methods are great. They are very clear and concise. Speaking for IELTS is an excellent course that really improved my speaking skills. All the meetings and materials were really helpful and informative. CEC has the best instructors.
quote2.name: Hayat
quote2.headline: Student

quote3.content: The lessons were fantastic and up to date. The teachers listen and help. I have lots of fun during my lessons.
quote3.name: Rob
quote3.headline: Student

quote4.content: Storytelling was fun and I cannot wait for more. Thank you, Teacher.
quote4.name: Emily
quote4.headline: Student

quote5.content: Teacher Charlene motivated me to keep learning and not give up. I'm happy to be part of CEC!
quote5.name: Lilly
quote5.headline: Student
